document.full_text: the devils, who had been on a tear in a late push to make the n.h.l. playoffs, lost, 3-1, in ottawa.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: devils' momentum halted with another loss to ottawa
lines_and_colors: the devils, who had been on a tear in a late push to make the n.h.l. playoffs, lost, 3-1, in ottawa.
